item.title: Christiana add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "Oh God, Frankie, I breathe in rhythm with that man. You think that's not my flesh and blood after all these years?" -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Erin Morgenstern
item.description: "You're in the right place at the right time, and you care enough to do what needs to be done. Sometimes that's enough." -- Erin Morgenstern

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Simon Rich
item.description:
"I still remember the day I got my first calculator
Teacher: All right, children, welcome to fourth grade math. Everyone take a calculator out of the bin. Me: What are these? Teacher: From now on we'll be using calculators. Me: What do these things do? Teacher: Simple operations, like multiplication and division. Me: You mean this device just...does them? By itself? Teacher: Yes. You enter in the problem and press equal. Me: You...you knew about this machine all along, didn't you? This whole time, while we were going through this...this charade with the pencils and the line paper and the stupid multiplication tables!...I'm sorry for shouting...It's just...I'm a little blown away. Teacher: Okay, everyone, today we're going to go over some word problems. Me: What the hell else do you have back there? A magical pen that writes book reports by itself? Some kind of automatic social studies worksheet that...that fills itself out? What the hell is going on? Teacher: If a farmer farms five acres of land a day-- Me: So that's it, then. The past three years have been a total farce. All this time I've been thinking, "Well, this is pretty hard and frustrating but I guess these are useful skills to have." Meanwhile, there was a whole bin of these things in your desk. We could have jumped straight to graphing. Unless, of course, there's some kind of graphing calculator! Teacher: There is. You get one in ninth grade. Me: Is this...Am I on TV? Is this a prank show? Teacher: No. " -- Simon Rich

item.title: Christiana add a quote by E. Lockhart
item.description:
"It is better to be alone, she figures, than to be with someone who can't see who you are. It is better to lead than to follow. It is better to speak up than stay silent. It is better to open doors than to shut them on people.
She will not be simple and sweet. She will not be what people tell her to be. That Bunny Rabbit is dead." -- E. Lockhart

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "Where did this come from? Do you know what this is? Luca is going to sneak out of bed in the middle of the night and squirt it on his tongue. It's like drugs for ten-year-olds. Today it's Ice Magic. Tomorrow, heroin." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Evelyn Waugh
item.description: "Punctuality is the virtue of the bored." -- Evelyn Waugh

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Erin Morgenstern
item.description: "You think, as you walk away from Le Cirque des Rêves and into the creeping dawn, that you felt more awake within the confines of the circus. You are no longer quite certain which side of the fence is the dream." -- Erin Morgenstern

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Erin Morgenstern
item.description: "I do not mourn the loss of my sister because she will always be with me, in my heart," she says. "I am, however, rather annoyed that my Tara has left me to suffer you lot alone. I do not see as well without her. I do not hear as well without her. I do not feel as well without her. I would be better off without a hand or a leg than without my sister. Then at least she would be here to mock my appearance and claim to be the pretty one for a change. We have all lost our Tara, but I have lost a part of myself as well." -- Erin Morgenstern

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Erin Morgenstern
item.description: "Most maidens are perfectly capable of rescuing themselves in my experience, at least the ones worth something, in any case." -- Erin Morgenstern

item.title: Christiana add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Maria Semple
item.description: "My heart started racing, not the bad kind of heart racing, like I'm going to die. But the good kind of heart racing, like, Hello, can I help you with something? If not, please step aside because I'm about to kick the shit out of life." -- Maria Semple

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Maria Semple
item.description: "We were like the Beatles, Dad.' 'I know you think that, sweetie' 'Seriously. Mom is John, you're Paul, I'm George, and Ice Cream is Ringo.' 'Ice Cream,' I said. 'Resentful of the past, fearful of the future...everytime we saw Ice Cream sitting there with her mouth open, we'd say, Poor Ice Cream, resentful of the past, fearful of the future." -- Maria Semple

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "As the lightness buoys me, I wonder if maybe she was right. Maybe it's not about looking hot for guys, but about feeling like a place acknowledged you, winked at you, accepted you. It's strange because, of all the people in all the cities, I'd have thought that to Parisians I'd be invisible, but apparently I'm not. Apparently in Paris, not only can I skate, but I practically qualify for the Olympics!" -- Gayle Forman

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "You're just trying on different identities, like everyone in those Shakespeare plays. And the people we pretend at, they're already in us. That's why we pretend them in the first place." -- Gayle Forman

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Gail Carriger
item.description: "<i>How have I never noticed she only required praise to find me acceptable?</i> wondered Sophronia, not quite realizing that this, too, was a mark of her new education. Many was the lady whose belief in another's sound judgment was based solely upon that other judging <i>her</i> favorably." -- Gail Carriger

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
item.description: "Happily ever after, or even just together ever after, is not cheesy,” Wren said. “It’s the noblest, like, the most courageous thing two people can shoot for." -- Rainbow Rowell

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
item.description: "You can park your snark at the gate, Omaha." -- Rainbow Rowell

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "Being able to depend on someone doesn't mean you're dependent on them." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Andrew Smith
item.description: "But when I was quiet...that made words too. The same words that make horrible things come also tell the quieter things about love." -- Andrew Smith

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
item.description: "She rested her head against his and felt, for the first time, what she would often feel with him: a self-affection. He made her like herself." -- Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "So I will wait, because I would rather wait for you than waste my time with someone who isn't you. And I will focus on the long game. As they say in baseball, losing game one and even game two is no reason to give up on the whole series. When you're ready, if you're ever ready, give me the word." -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I love you also means I love you more than anyone loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that no one loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that I love no one else, and never have loved anyone else, and never will love anyone else." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Kate Hattemer
item.description: "He didn't know that sometimes, the most awesome and complicated thing you can do is just stick around." -- Kate Hattemer

item.title: Christiana add a quote by Kate Hattemer
item.description: "When you die I bet you want real life, pure real life, eulogies that are unpoetic and messy, smeared with tears and truisms, cliched as hell, the kind of stuff a person means." -- Kate Hattemer
